languages.text: {n}Вы обращаетесь к команде с воодушевляющей речью и слышите собственный голос, разносящийся по всем, даже самым укромным уголкам корабля. Когда эфир заканчивается, со всех сторон слышатся возгласы одобрения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы обращаетесь к команде с воодушевляющей речью и слышите собственный голос, разносящийся по всем, даже самым укромным уголкам корабля. Когда эфир заканчивается, со всех сторон слышатся возгласы одобрения.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы обращаетесь к команде с воодушевляющей речью и слышите собственный голос, разносящийся по всем, даже самым укромным уголкам корабля. Когда эфир заканчивается, со всех сторон слышатся возгласы одобрения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll though all, even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: {n}Te diriges a la tripulación con un discurso motivador y oyes tu voz retumbar por la nave, alcanzando los rincones más silenciosos. Cuando termina la transmisión, oyes gritos lejanos de aprobación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te diriges a la tripulación con un discurso motivador y oyes tu voz retumbar por la nave, alcanzando los rincones más silenciosos. Cuando termina la transmisión, oyes gritos lejanos de aprobación.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: {n}你向船员们发表了一场振奋人心的讲话。你的声音在飞船中四处回荡，甚至回响在那些一向寂静的角落。当音阵广播结束时，你听到远处传来了赞同的呼喊声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你向船员们发表了一场振奋人心的讲话。你的声音在飞船中四处回荡，甚至回响在那些一向寂静的角落。当音阵广播结束时，你听到远处传来了赞同的呼喊声。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: {n}熱いスピーチでクルーに語りかけ、その声が船中に響き渡り、いつもはシンとした角の方まで届いていた。放送が終わると、遠くからワーッと好意的な歓声が聞こえてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}熱いスピーチでクルーに語りかけ、その声が船中に響き渡り、いつもはシンとした角の方まで届いていた。放送が終わると、遠くからワーッと好意的な歓声が聞こえてきた。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: {n}Du hältst eine aufrüttelnde Ansprache an die Crew und hörst, wie deine Stimme durch das Schiff hallt und sogar die üblicherweise stillen Ecken erreicht. Nach dem Ende der Übertragung hörst du entfernte Rufe der Zustimmung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hältst eine aufrüttelnde Ansprache an die Crew und hörst, wie deine Stimme durch das Schiff hallt und sogar die üblicherweise stillen Ecken erreicht. Nach dem Ende der Übertragung hörst du entfernte Rufe der Zustimmung.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: {n}Votre discours passionné est diffusé dans tout le vaisseau, résonnant entre ses cloisons jusque dans les recoins habituellement silencieux. Une fois la transmission terminée, vous entendez des cris lointains d'approbation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre discours passionné est diffusé dans tout le vaisseau, résonnant entre ses cloisons jusque dans les recoins habituellement silencieux. Une fois la transmission terminée, vous entendez des cris lointains d'approbation.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: {n}İlham veren bir konuşmayla mürettebata sesleniyorsun. Sesin geminin her yanında yankılanıp normalde çıt çıkmayan köşelere bile ulaşıyor. Yayın sona erdiğinde uzaklardan destek tezahüratları duymaya başlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You address the crew with a rousing speech and hear your voice roll through the ship, reaching even the normally quiet corners of the vessel. When the broadcast ends, you hear distant shouts of approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İlham veren bir konuşmayla mürettebata sesleniyorsun. Sesin gemi boyunca yankılanıp normalde son derece sessiz duran köşelere bile ulaşıyor. Yayın sona erdiğinde uzaklardan destek tezahüratları duymaya başlıyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster
